excerpt: "\"It is an honor to be named as the top Startup of the Year, and to be highlighted by IT World Awards' select panel f international expert judges,\" said Karthik Krishnan, Concentric CEO. \"Concentric stands out in the industry due to its use of advanced deep-learning technology to solve the ongoing challenges of unstructured and structured data security - both in the cloud and on-premises."
